metadata.Title: CVE-2021-28235 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Authentication vulnerability found in Etcd-io v.3.4.10 allows remote attackers to escalate privileges via the debug function.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-28235` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

etcd - 3.2.17+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1+esm2
etcd-client - 3.2.17+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1+esm2
etcd-server - 3.2.17+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1+esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: etcd package in esm-apps/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.2.17+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1+esm2').
